name: Deluxe Lynx
description: The impressive curly birch handle, combined with a cast finger guard, gives this knife a truly luxurious character. An excellent gift idea for a hiker or an avid hunter.
The sheath of the knife is designed to withstand even harsh conditions. A handy flap makes sure this knife stays in the sheath safely.

properties.name: Handle material
properties.value: Curly birch, waxed, cast finger guard
